comments:
I20060919-0010

- enable renaming in the editor
- have the following CU:
----- Main.java ------
package org.eclipse.m5testing ;

public class Main
{
    void foobar ( )
    {
    }
    void method( )
    {
        foobar();
    }
}
---------------------

- in 'method', place the caret inside the call to 'foobar'
- press Alt+Shift+R to rename
- replace the method name with two spaces "  "
- in the hint hover-like shell, click on "Refactor Rename"

> the editor is restored to the original contents
> no message
> this exception in the log (same if pressing <return> instead of clicking into the hint shell)
